snippet: “Graphic Design: Now in Production,” on Governors Island, shows that designers may practice their art in the service of commerce, but they also have powerful tools for critique.
abstract: Martha Schwendener reviews exhibit Graphic Design: Now in Production, showcasing branding and graphics created since 2000, at Building 110 on Governors Island.
lead_paragraph: “Graphic Design: Now in Production,” on Governors Island, shows that designers may practice their art in the service of commerce, but they also have powerful tools for critique.

headline.seo: ‘Graphic Design: Now in Production’ on Governors Island
headline.main: Design in the Service of Subversion
headline.print_headline: Design in the Service of Subversion
